channel.title: Comments on: Cookin’ With First Congregational

item.title: By: rick mechtly
item.dc:creator: rick mechtly
item.description: Not trying to be brutal Mary - but that church can't actually be considered as a piece of actual Bunker Hill landscape- though it's citizens likely filled the pews.... Q:Are you sitting now where Christina had her station and isn't she still doing her thing nearby ??
item.content:encoded: Not trying to be brutal Mary – but that church can’t actually be considered as a piece of actual Bunker Hill landscape- though it’s citizens likely filled the pews…. Q:Are you sitting now where Christina had her station and isn’t she still doing her thing nearby ??
